Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Interface GameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of winning strategy
All Superinterfaces:
Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
ControllableGameSolver<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractControllableGameSolver, AbstractGameSolver, BigStepSolver, ClassicalBuchiSolver, DeadEndSolver, DominionDecompositionSolver, GlobalOptimizationSolver, McNaughtonZielonkaSolver, ReachabilitySolver, RecursiveSolver, SmallProgressMeasureSolver
public interface GameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>
extends Algorithm
This interfaces defines game solvers.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addGameListener​(GameListener listener)
    Registers a game listener.
    java.util.Collection<GameListener> getGameListeners()
    Returns all game listeners registered to this game solver.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Returns the name of this solver.
    boolean isApplicable​(Game g)
    Returns true if the specified game is supported by this solver.
    void removeGameListener​(GameListener listener)
    Unregisters a game listener.
    Solution<T> solve​(Game game)
    Returns a solution of a specified game.
    Solution<T> solve​(Game game, StateSet subgame)
    Returns a solution of a subgame of a specified game.

      game - a game
      subgame - the states of the subgame in the game
      Returns:
      a solution of the specified game
